abort.already_configured: The Thread border router is already configured

error.already_configured: The Thread border router is already configured

get_get_border_agent_id_unsupported.description:
Your OTBR does not support Border Agent ID.

To fix this issue, update the OTBR to the latest version and restart Home Assistant.
If you are using an OTBR integrated in Home Assistant, update either the OpenThread Border Router add-on or the Silicon Labs Multiprotocol add-on. Otherwise update your self-managed OTBR.
get_get_border_agent_id_unsupported.title: The OTBR does not support Border Agent ID
